name: Hover Racer
description:
Summary

You are Bonzai Chaser, professional Australian hover racer. The invention of the Flippy Do has lead to a new era of racing, but first you must prove yourself worthy to compete.

Fly across tracks and react fast enough to dodge blocks and maintain your fuel level.

Alpha

This alpha allows the user to race against the clock to collect a score, it also contains speed boost which allow the user to move faster for a short period.

Current Features:

  • Driving
  • Flipping
  • Ship Customisation
  • Score Board
  • Speed Boosts

Beta

This beta provides more user feedback, some refining and addresses received feedback. 

Current Features:

  • Driving
  • Flipping
  • Ship Customisation
  • Score Board
  • Speed Boosts
  • Spot Effects
  • Health System
  • Refined UI

Controls

W, A, S, D = Movement.

Space = Flip.

Recommended Settings

Full Screen.

1920x1080.

Any feedback is appreciated.

Second year University project.
